text: Jukka Halme (born 29 May 1985) is a Finnish footballer, who currently plays as a midfielder for HIFK. Halme has played for HIFK in three highest tiers of Finnish football; Veikkausliiga, Ykkönen and Kakkonen. He made his Veikkausliiga debut in 2015 season opener against IFK Mariehamn. Halme has also played for PK-35 Vantaa. He is also the vice-captain of HIFK, commonly captaining the team in absence of Esa Terävä. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish footballers Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:HIFK Fotboll players Category:Käpylän Pallo players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Jukka Halme
